data.comment: Lokomotiv Moscow kick-off the first half - the match is underway!
Sergey Karasev signals a Lokomotiv Moscow throw-in in Spartak Moscow's half.
In the minute 1, Lokomotiv Moscow awarded a free kick in their own half.
Throw-in for Spartak Moscow in their own half.
Free kick Lokomotiv Moscow.
In the minute 3, Free kick for Lokomotiv Moscow in the half of Spartak Moscow.
Sergey Karasev awards the home team a throw-in.
Throw-in for Spartak Moscow in the half of Lokomotiv Moscow.
In the minute 5, Spartak Moscow are in shooting range from this free kick.
Lokomotiv Moscow's Dmitri Barinov has been booked in Moscow.
Attention is being given to Lokomotiv Moscow’s Dmitri Barinov and play has been suspended briefly.
In the minute 8, Spartak Moscow's Jordan Larsson gets in a shot on goal at Otkritie Arena. But the effort is unsuccessful.
Lokomotiv Moscow’s Dmitri Barinov is on his feet again at Otkritie Arena.
Sergey Karasev signals a free kick to Lokomotiv Moscow in their own half.
In the minute 9, Spartak Moscow will need to be alert as they defend a dangerous free kick from Lokomotiv Moscow.
Lokomotiv Moscow's Murilo Cerqueira scores with his head to give his side a 0-1 lead.
That's a fine assist from Aleksey Miranchuk.
In the minute 11, Throw-in for Lokomotiv Moscow at Otkritie Arena.
In Moscow a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Ball safe as Lokomotiv Moscow is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 16, Play has been temporarily suspended for attention to Dmitri Barinov for Lokomotiv Moscow who is writhing in pain on the pitch.
Spartak Moscow's Nail Umyarov is on target but unsuccessful.
Marko Nikolic (Lokomotiv Moscow) is making a first change, with Stanislav Magkeev replacing the possibly injured Dmitri Barinov.
In the minute 19, A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Free kick for Spartak Moscow in their own half.
Lokomotiv Moscow awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 20, Lokomotiv Moscow to take a throw-in in Spartak Moscow territory.
Aleksey Miranchuk (Lokomotiv Moscow) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
Lokomotiv Moscow pushes forward through Eder, whose finish on goal is saved.
In the minute 21, Lokomotiv Moscow needs to be cautious. Spartak Moscow have an attacking throw-in.
Corner awarded to Spartak Moscow.
Sergey Karasev awards Lokomotiv Moscow a goal kick.
In the minute 23, Can Spartak Moscow get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Lokomotiv Moscow's half?
Throw-in Lokomotiv Moscow.
Throw-in for Spartak Moscow in their own half.
In the minute 26, Sergey Karasev signals a Spartak Moscow throw-in in Lokomotiv Moscow's half.
Sergey Karasev signals a free kick to Spartak Moscow.
Lokomotiv Moscow drive forward but Fedor Smolov is judged offside.
In the minute 28, Spartak Moscow push forward at Otkritie Arena and Zelimkhan Bakaev gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined Lokomotiv Moscow defence.
Sergey Karasev signals a free kick to Lokomotiv Moscow in their own half.
In Moscow Lokomotiv Moscow attack through Grzegorz Krychowiak. The finish is off target, however.
In the minute 29, Spartak Moscow have a goal kick.
Jordan Larsson of Spartak Moscow gets in a strike, but is off target.
Ball goes out of play for a Lokomotiv Moscow goal kick.
In the minute 32, Spartak Moscow have a dangerous throw-in.
Play has been interrupted briefly in Moscow to check on Aleksey Miranchuk, who is grimacing with pain.
Nail Umyarov for Spartak Moscow drives towards goal at Otkritie Arena. But the finish is unsuccessful.
In the minute 34, It's a goal kick for the home team in Moscow.
Aleksey Miranchuk for Lokomotiv Moscow is back on the field again.
Sergey Karasev signals a throw-in for Spartak Moscow, close to Lokomotiv Moscow's area.
In the minute 35, Throw-in for Spartak Moscow close to the penalty box.
The match at Otkritie Arena has been interrupted briefly for a check on Aleksey Miranchuk, who is down injured.
Can Spartak Moscow capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Lokomotiv Moscow's half?
Free kick for Spartak Moscow in the half of Lokomotiv Moscow.
Lokomotiv Moscow to take a throw-in in Spartak Moscow territory.
In the minute 37, Dmitry Rybchinskiy (Lokomotiv Moscow) has replaced the possibly injured Aleksey Miranchuk.
In the minute 38, Spartak Moscow awarded a free kick in their own half.
Spartak Moscow's Jordan Larsson has run offside.
Free kick for Spartak Moscow in their own half.
Free kick in a good position for Spartak Moscow!
In the minute 42, Maciej Rybus (Lokomotiv Moscow) has received a yellow card from Sergey Karasev.
In the minute 44, Free kick Spartak Moscow.
Grzegorz Krychowiak (Lokomotiv Moscow) has received a first yellow card.
Goal kick for Lokomotiv Moscow at Otkritie Arena.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Moscow.
In the minute 45, Sergey Karasev will wait an extra 4 minutes before blowing the whistle to end the 1st half.
In Moscow a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Goal kick for Lokomotiv Moscow at Otkritie Arena.
In the minute 45, Spartak Moscow awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Sergey Karasev signals a free kick to Lokomotiv Moscow in their own half.
Throw-in for Lokomotiv Moscow in the half of Spartak Moscow.
In the minute 45, Ball safe as Spartak Moscow is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Spartak Moscow are too eager and fall into an offside trap.
The first-half is over at Otkritie Arena.
In the minute 46, It's Spartak Moscow with the kick-off after the break.
Throw-in high up the field for Lokomotiv Moscow in Moscow.
Sergey Karasev awards Lokomotiv Moscow a goal kick.
In the minute 48, Lokomotiv Moscow have a goal kick.
Spartak Moscow awarded a free kick in their own half.
Throw-in for Spartak Moscow at Otkritie Arena.
In the minute 50, A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Zelimkhan Bakaev (Spartak Moscow) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Spartak Moscow have been awarded a corner by Sergey Karasev.
In the minute 52, Free kick for Spartak Moscow in their own half.
Goal! The home team draw level at 1-1 through Jordan Larsson.
Nail Umyarov with an assist there.
In the minute 54, Sergey Karasev signals a free kick to Lokomotiv Moscow in their own half.
Lokomotiv Moscow are pushing forward but Grzegorz Krychowiak's finish is wide of the goal.
Ball goes out of play for a Spartak Moscow goal kick.
In the minute 56, Lokomotiv Moscow needs to be cautious. Spartak Moscow have an attacking throw-in.
Spartak Moscow have been awarded a corner by Sergey Karasev.
Important block from the Lokomotiv Moscow defence as Jordan Larsson fires in a strike for Spartak Moscow.
In the minute 57, Free kick for Lokomotiv Moscow in their own half.
Sergey Karasev waits before resuming play because Ezequiel Ponce for Spartak Moscow is still down.
Ezequiel Ponce (Spartak Moscow) does not seem to be able to continue. He is replaced by Aleksandr Sobolev.
In the minute 60, Corner awarded to Lokomotiv Moscow.
Sergey Karasev awards the home team a throw-in.
Sergey Karasev signals a free kick to Spartak Moscow.
In the minute 61, Sergey Karasev signals a free kick to Spartak Moscow just outside Lokomotiv Moscow's area.
Nail Umyarov gets his shot on target but fails to score for Spartak Moscow.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Moscow.
In the minute 63, Throw-in Lokomotiv Moscow.
Sergey Karasev awards Spartak Moscow a goal kick.
Spartak Moscow drives forward and Jordan Larsson gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
In the minute 64, Sergey Karasev signals a free kick to Lokomotiv Moscow.
Throw-in for Spartak Moscow in their own half.
Spartak Moscow awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 66, In Moscow Spartak Moscow drive forward through Alex Kral. His shot is on target but it's saved.
In Moscow a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Lokomotiv Moscow's Eder misses with an attempt on goal.
In the minute 67, Spartak Moscow have a goal kick.
Free kick Spartak Moscow.
Free kick for Spartak Moscow in the half of Lokomotiv Moscow.
In the minute 69, Vedran Corluka (Lokomotiv Moscow) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
Spartak Moscow drive upfield and Samuel Gigot gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Lokomotiv Moscow defender.
Spartak Moscow have been awarded a corner by Sergey Karasev.
In the minute 72, Ayrton Lucas (Spartak Moscow) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Corner awarded to Spartak Moscow.
Zelimkhan Bakaev (Spartak Moscow) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
In the minute 74, Eder for Lokomotiv Moscow gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
Ball goes out of play for a Spartak Moscow goal kick.
Spartak Moscow have been awarded a corner by Sergey Karasev.
In the minute 76, Goal kick for Lokomotiv Moscow at Otkritie Arena.
Can Lokomotiv Moscow capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Spartak Moscow's half?
Play has been interrupted briefly in Moscow to check on Samuel Gigot, who is grimacing with pain.
In the minute 78, Samuel Gigot is back on the pitch.
Throw-in for Lokomotiv Moscow close to the penalty box.
Domenico Tedesco is making the team's second substitution at Otkritie Arena with Maksim Glushenkov replacing Zelimkhan Bakaev.
In the minute 80, Fedor Smolov (Lokomotiv Moscow) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Free kick Spartak Moscow.
Dmitry Rybchinskiy for Lokomotiv Moscow has been booked by Sergey Karasev and receives a first yellow card.
In the minute 81, Aleksandr Sobolev heads in to make it 2-1 at Otkritie Arena.
Great play from Alex Kral to set up the goal.
Anton Miranchuk gets his shot on target but fails to score for Lokomotiv Moscow.
In the minute 83, Can Spartak Moscow get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Lokomotiv Moscow's half?
The match at Otkritie Arena has been interrupted briefly for a check on Dmitry Rybchinskiy, who is down injured.
Dmitry Rybchinskiy is back on his feet again.
In the minute 84, The away team have replaced Eder with Francois Kamano. This is the third substitution made today by Marko Nikolic.
In the minute 85, Free kick for Lokomotiv Moscow in their own half.
It seems as if Dmitry Rybchinskiy is unable to continue. Vitali Lisakovich replaces him for the away team.
Rifat Zhemaletdinov is replacing Fedor Smolov for the away team.
In Moscow a free kick has been awarded the away team.
At Otkritie Arena, Nail Umyarov has been yellow-carded for the home team.
In the minute 87, Throw-in Spartak Moscow.
Can Spartak Moscow capitalize from this dangerous free kick?
Spartak Moscow surge into the attack at Otkritie Arena but Aleksandr Sobolev’s header is off-target.
In the minute 88, Ball goes out of play for a Lokomotiv Moscow goal kick.
Sergey Karasev signals a free kick to Spartak Moscow in their own half.
Lokomotiv Moscow awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 89, Spartak Moscow awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Lokomotiv Moscow awarded a free kick in their own half.
The fourth official's board shows 3 minutes, which will be added to the 2nd half.
Sergey Karasev signals a free kick to Spartak Moscow in their own half.
Ball safe as Spartak Moscow is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Free kick for Spartak Moscow in their own half.
It's 2-1 as the referee blows for full-time.
Sergey Karasev waits before resuming play because Nail Umyarov for Spartak Moscow is still down.
The home team replace Jordan Larsson with Guus Til.
The home team has substituted Nail Umyarov with Andrey Eshchenko. Domenico Tedesco is thus making his fourth change.
